entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 3 April 2023
